segments.text: I observe the scene carefully, starting with the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing the plate with care, dress and apron fitting the homemaker vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing though, water streaming out endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how it's drenching the cabinet doors and pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's submerged in it, and she just keeps drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste of water; it makes my stomach turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the boy's perched on that rickety stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing with a plate in the other hand, looking determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's all set to receive, her little hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet seeing them share the moment, even if it's naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's tiltingâ€” I hold my breath watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's neat paths and bushes offer a calm escape.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen's hazards are hidden in plain sight, so unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the slipperiness everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
